text: The Royal Belgian Football Association is the organization that controls football in Belgium. They won the FIFA Fair Play Award in 1992. ==Teams and competitions== * Men's national team * Woman's national team * First Division A * First Division B * Belgian Cup * Belgian Supercup * Women's competitions: ** Super League ** First Division ** Second Division ** Third Division ** Belgian Women's Cup ==Other websites== *Official website *Belgium at FIFA site *Belgium at UEFA site Category:1890s establishments in Belgium Category:1895 establishments in Europe Category:Football in Belgium Belgium Category:Sports organizations of Belgium
title: Royal Belgian Football Association
